PHILIP MORRIS
COMPANIES INC.
120 PARK AVENUE, NEW YORK, N.,Y.10017
(PHILIP-MORRIS)(MO) PHILIP MORRIS COMPANIES INC. DECLARES
REGULAR OUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $.825 A COMMON SHARE
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Nov. 23, 1994--The Board of Directors
of Philip Morris Companies Ine. (NYsE:Mo) today declared a zegular
quarterly dividend of $.825 a share on the company's common stock,
payable on January i0, 'i995 to stockholders of record as of December
The company said it was maintaining the dividend at its current
level after increasing it twice in 1994. The two increases, to $.69
per share from $.65 per share in February, and to $.825 in August,
raised the quarterly payout by 26.98 this year.
Philip Morris Companies Inc. is the world's largest producer of
consumer packaged gcods, with annual revenues of almost $6i billion.
It has five principal operating companies: Philip Morris u.s.A.
Philip Morris International Inc., Kraft General Foods, Inc., Miller
Brewing Co. and Philip Morris Capital Corp.
CONTAcT: Philip Morris Companies Inc., New York
